Name: Hardik Pandya
Teams: India, Baroda, Mumbai Indians, India A, India AT20, Indian Board Presidents XI, World XI
Bio: Hardik Pya swears by living life king size  that exuberance finds expression in his powerful hitting in the middle order  brisk seam bowling,He first caught the eye with an unbeaten 31-ball 61 for Mumbai Indians against Kolkata Knight Riders in IPL 2015,but displayed greater consistency in the Syed Mushtaq Ali domestic T20 tournament in January 2016,He finished as the leading run-getter,with 377 runs in 10 innings at an average of 53
